text: Donatella Versace's blockbuster Spring/Summer 2018 show was a moving tribute to her late brother Gianni. More recently, she revived his iconic bondage dress from his Spring/Summer 1994 collection for Fall/Winter 2019. Both homages serve as proof that many of his designs from the late '80s and '90s look just as relevant today. On what would have been his 73rd birthday, CR revisits 20 of his most exquisite creations.
title: A Tribute to Gianni Versace's Most Iconic Designs

og.title: A Tribute to Gianni Versace's Most Iconic Designs
og.description: In honor of the Italian designer's birthday today, CR looks back on his unforgettable fashion moments

meta_data.title: Gianni Versace's Most Iconic Dresses - 20 of the Best Vintage Versace Looks
meta_data.description: From Gianni Versace's Warhol pop art prints to to the house's signature chainmail dresses, looking back at 20 of the most iconic designs by Gianni Versace.
